mapper.insert: insert into a_review(no, url, cnt, content, reg_date, writer, aid) values(a_review_seq.nextVal, #{url}, #{cnt}, #{content}, sysdate, #{writer}, #{aid})
mapper.select: select no, url, cnt, content, reg_date, writer, aid from a_review where aid = #{aid} order by no desc
mapper.update: update a_review set content=#{content},reg_date=sysdate where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from a_review where aid =#{aid}
select cnt from a_review where no=#{no}

select no, url, cnt, content, reg_date, writer, aid from (select rownum numrow, a.* from (select * from a_review where aid=#{aid} order by no desc) a) where numrow between #{start} and #{end} order by cnt desc
select no from a_like where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: update a_review set cnt=cnt+1 where no=#{no}
